description: Translate only rows having disturbance info or disturbance year greater than 0
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Maps source value to DIST_TYPE_1 using lists of values
For NB01, assign disturbances to whichever layer is being translated. For NB01 disturbances are specified to layer 1 or 2. In NB02, disturbance is for the polygon so report UNKNOWN for layer.
